name: discord-auto-meme
description: A Discord client that sends memes based on friends' gaming activities

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm test" "cd client && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint:fix" "cd client && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd server && npm run format" "cd client && npm run format"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules
